name: Tick (TernaryGames)
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam #193!
 - TURN BASED PLATFORMER -

I joined the jam when it was already halfway over, so this was a stressful but fun challenge to create!

Howdy! This is a game about a robot named Tick.

Click and release to jump. Navigate tricky terrain, collect coins, and reach the final prize!

Programming and Art by Jenni Zimmerle
Sound Effects created by Jenni Zimmerle using jsfxr.

Music: "november" by Melvin Dovinté.
